Patients undergo curative colon resection via laparotomy . Patients randomize 1 2 arm 1:1 ratio . Arm I ( Perioperative 5-FU ) : Within 24 hour colon resection , patient receive perioperative 5-fluorouracil ( 5-FU ) intravenously ( IV ) 24 hour 7 day . Arm II ( No perioperative 5-FU ) : Patients receive perioperative fluorouracil . After surgery , patient stage I , stage IIA , stage IV colon cancer immediately remove study .
